title: internet is good but i disconnect
body:
i play a couple games no problem but i get some that i only get to level 3 and i get disconnected and because of that i get penalized for it   i have great internet and my computer works great for my other games 

am i the only one having this issue 

will i get credit for time served

replies.body: It sounds like your account received a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty, which occurs after leaving multiple games.  Even if you return to the game, you're still gone for a period of time which causes other players a negative experience.  The best way to restore your standing with the system is by playing without anymore interruptions.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve whatever is causing your network to lose connection to the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!
